name: Audi Q3 Sportback
description: The price of Audi Q3 Sportback, a 5 seater Coupe, ranges from Rs. 54.22  - 55.71 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants, with an engine of 1984 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. Q3 Sportback has an NCAP rating of 5 stars. Audi Q3 Sportback is available in 5 colours.

variants.variant_name: Q3 Sportback Technology Plus S-line 1984 cc, Petrol, Automatic (DCT), 193 bhp
